name: Vertical Drop Heroes HD

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Vertical Drop Heroes HD/Vertical Drop Heroes HD.exe

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Please select the Humble installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Vertical Drop Heroes HD/Vertical Drop Heroes HD.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    args: '"/S" "/D="C:\\Program Files\\Vertical Drop Heroes HD""'
    executable: $file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
